title: My Mouse Broke 30mins into a Game....
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/xRISE6Z.jpg)
~~Spoiler: we lost.~~
Anyhow, I need a new one and as I do not feel I ever know enough of brands and which are just expensive names with no tangible value I figured someone on the forums may know a lot more than me about this (lot of people who play games). So, I am looking to buy a new mouse (hoping for an upper-limit of 70$) that works well and doesn't break fast. I don't need many side buttons as I only used 3-4 for league (wards and some item actives). My old mouse was a Razer Naga 2014 which lasted about 3 years ;(

(I wasn't sure which board would be best for this, but I figured it does  invlolve league in a _general_ way.)
